name: Damage Cam - Fake Prank Photo Editor Booth
name_original: Damage Cam - Fake Prank Photo Editor Booth
description:
* FREE * For a limited Time Only! Get It While You Can!

> UNLEASH YOUR INNER PRANKSTER!

Trick your friends, family, work colleagues or total strangers
into thinking their stuff is damaged beyond repair!

> SOME IDEAS:
• Fake car dents and scratches - Does your buddy love his car? Ha ha perfect!
• Window, monitors and TV smashes
• Create your own realistic looking crime scene

This is the best prank app available with nearly 70 filter pranks. Share your hilarious prank pics on Twitter, Facebook or email. #DamageCam

> HOW DAMAGE CAM WORKS:

- Simply take a pic or choose an existing one from your camera roll
- Position and resize the guide on the item to be 'fake damaged' and touch done
- Your pic will morph into a broken mess! lol
- Simply touch 'Change Damage' (top, middle button) to choose a different filter
- Click on Edit if you need to reposition or fine tune the effect
- Gesture Edit control - turn the guide left or right with two fingers
- Gesture Edit control - double tap the guide to apply the filter
- Share and have fun! - #DamageCam

Share your Damage Cam Pics on our FaceBook page:
www.facebook.com/DeadCoolApps

#DamageCam

Download now FREE for a limited time! :-)

WARNING: Use this app responsibly! ;-)
